caption.p: Changes in chick diet with sea-ice concentration (SIC; N = 298). ( a) Calanus finmarchicus, GAM, p = 0.001, R² = 0.05; ( b) C. glacialis, GAM, p < 0.0001, R² = 0.13; ( c) other prey species, GAM, p < 0.0001, R² = 0.28; ( d) Apherusa glacialis, linear model, p = 0.01, R² = 0.04, y = 0.035x-2.1; and ( e) C. hyperboreus, linear model, p = 0.25, R² = 0.005. Logit (p + a) represents the logit transformation applied to the proportion of prey (p) and a constant a (see Material and Methods for details).
